analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/6/0x646cec6ee42d258336165cbbd5deb4af14f0f476.sol:
	Contract SolarDaoToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/6/0x646cec6ee42d258336165cbbd5deb4af14f0f476.sol#177-178)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

SolarDaoToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x646cec6ee42d258336165cbbd5deb4af14f0f476.sol#123-124)
SolarDaoToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x646cec6ee42d258336165cbbd5deb4af14f0f476.sol#123)
SolarDaoToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x646cec6ee42d258336165cbbd5deb4af14f0f476.sol#123)
